name: Kung Fu Panda Dojo Mojo
summary: Get in the Dojo and test your Kung Fu skills with the Kung Fu Panda! This easy to play, fun action game from ICE brings Dreamworks hilarious blockbuster movie to the arcades. Players must destroy targets that appear on screen by Kung Fu chopping the games action pads! Players must aim for the big scores to win the most tickets!
